SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface VirtualView

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
View, ViewWrapper
public interface VirtualView extends Remote
Remote Interface that allows to define standard methods to update a player's view.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    confirmJoin(String nickname, GameData savings)

  • Method Details

    • setController

      void setController(VirtualController controller) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to give the player a reference to the remote object that allows the player to actually play the game
      Parameters:
      controller - a remove object that the player can use to play the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of errors with the remote communication

    • setPlayerIdentifier

      void setPlayerIdentifier(String playerIdentifier) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to give the player their unique identifier.

      The player is expected to add this identifier in every message that they're going to send to the server from now on.

      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the playerIdentifier generated by the server for this client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of errors with the remote communication

    • setStartingCard

      void setStartingCard(StartCard card) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to give the player their starting card.
      Parameters:
      card - the StartCard object representing the player starting card.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of error with the remote communication

    • setCommonGoals

      void setCommonGoals(Goal[] goals) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to give the player the public goals.
      Parameters:
      goals - a list of Goal objects that represents the public goals for the current game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of error with the remote communication.

    • setAvailablePrivateGoals

      void setAvailablePrivateGoals(Goal[] goals) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to give the player the available private goals.
      Parameters:
      goals - a list of Goal object that represents the available private goals.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of error with the remote communication.

    • setDefinitivePrivateGoal

      void setDefinitivePrivateGoal(Goal goal) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to give the player their definitive private goal.
      Parameters:
      goal - the Goal object representing the player definitive private Goal.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of error with the remote communication.

    • setPlayersCard

      void setPlayersCard(String playerNickname, PlayCard card, int index) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to give the player one of the cards in their hand.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player whose board needs to be updated.
      card - the PlayCard object representing the new card to put in the player's hand.
      index - the index of the player's hand array that needs to be updated
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of error with the remote communication.

    • setVisibleCard

      void setVisibleCard(PlayCard card, int index) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to inform the player that one of the visible cards has changed.
      Parameters:
      card - the PlayCard object representing the new visible card.
      index - the index of the visible card to change.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of error with the remote communication.

    • setDeckTopResource

      void setDeckTopResource(Resource resource, int index) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to inform the player that one of the decks has changed
      Parameters:
      resource - the Resource object representing the resource on the back of the card on top of the deck.
      index - the deckID that identify the deck that needs to be updated.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of error with the remote communication

    • placeCardOnPlayersBoard

      void placeCardOnPlayersBoard(String playerNickName, CardSlot cardSlot, CardLocation location) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to inform the player that a card was placed on a board.
      Parameters:
      playerNickName - the nickname of the player whose board needs to be updated.
      cardSlot - the CardSlot that contains the card that was placed.
      location - the location where the CardSlot needs to be placed.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of error with the remote communication

    • updateGameList

      void updateGameList(Set<String> availableGames) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to hand the player the available games list.
      Parameters:
      availableGames - a set of integer, each integer represents the ID of an available game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of error with the remote communication

    • confirmJoin

      void confirmJoin(String nickname, GameData savings) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to confirm that the client (whose view this is) successfully joined the game with a certain nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname that the clients chose when they joined the game.
      savings - if the player is rejoining a game, this ClientGameData object contains all data that the player need
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of error with the remote communication.

    • updatePlayersList

      void updatePlayersList(String[] nicknames, PlayerColor[] colors) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to provide an updated version of the players list with nicknames and colors.

      An update can be triggered by a player joining, a player selecting/changing their color and by the game starting (shuffling).

      Parameters:
      nicknames - the array of nicknames of the players in the game.
      colors - the array of colors of the players in the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of error with the remote communication.

    • updateGameStatus

      void updateGameStatus(GameStatus gameStatus, TurnStatus turnStatus, String playersTurn) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to inform the client when the game's status changes.
      Parameters:
      gameStatus - the current game phase
      turnStatus - the current turn status (either DRAW or PLACE)
      playersTurn - the nickname of the player that needs to play.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of errors with the remote communication

    • reportError

      void reportError(RuntimeException exception) throws RemoteException
      When an exception is raised on the Server when processing a Client's request, if the client is recognized, this method interface allows to send the raised exception to the client.
      Parameters:
      exception - a RuntimeException containing the error that needs to be reported.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of errors with the remote communication.

    • updateScore

      void updateScore(ScoreBoard scoreBoard) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to provide an updated scoreboard to the client.
      Parameters:
      scoreBoard - the updated scoreboard
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of errors with the remote communication.

    • ping

      void ping(boolean isAnswer) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to send a ping message to the client.
      Parameters:
      isAnswer - true if the server is answering to a previous ping message, false if the server is checking on the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of errors with the remote communication.

    • sendChatMsg

      void sendChatMsg(ChatMessage chatMessage, boolean isPrivate) throws RemoteException
      Allows the server to forward a chat message to the client.
      Parameters:
      chatMessage - the ChatMessage object that contains info about the message
      isPrivate - true if the message is private, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of errors with the remote communication.
